name: Bowmaster The Archery Boy - Christmas Special

description:
Now only you can help Bowmaster clean the village of all the bad guys. Earn and coin to unlock all the Archery Team.

• Many INSANE ARCHERY tribal CHARACTERS from all the wild tribes!
• DIFFERENT WEAPONS
• Rag-doll physics!
• EPIC DUELS WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Your ready to become an Archery Master
